1101000011001010 1101001100101010 0 -> sum: 1010001111110100, cout: 1
0110101010110011 1100011010101010 1 -> sum: 0011000101011110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
